title: About ChiroMed Health Center
subtitle: Our Story
content: Living with chronic pain and impaired function can take much of the joy out of daily life. At ChiroMed Health Center in Santa Ana, California, Dr. Mark Gutierrez offers chiropractic care using a powerful combination of traditional healing methods and state-of-the-art technology.

ChiroMed Health Center was founded on the belief that your chiropractor should be a partner in your lifetime health journey. To that end, Dr. Gutierrez strives to not only treat your current condition, but to also give you the information and tools you need to effectively manage your own health even after treatment is complete.

title: Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui laborum.
subtitle: OUR CLIENTS
